You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesP P] > &prime;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Prime;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2033/index.htm U+02033].
  * `&prime;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2032/index.htm U+02032].
